 It has not been a great year for dance on the musical theater stage – until now. Choreographers Patricia Delgado and New York City Ballet’s Justin Peck bring it all to the tiny stage at the Atlantic Theater Company. The many dances this married duo has created for the new musical “Buena Vista Social Club” erupt in a chemical reaction where ballet, Afro-Cuban, contemporary and a variety of social dances both blend and slam into each other.

keyPhrases.quote: It has not been a great year for dance on the musical theater stage – until now
erupt in a chemical reaction where ballet, Afro-Cuban, contemporary and a variety of social dances both blend and slam into each other
bring it all to the tiny stage at the Atlantic Theater Company

llmScore.reasoning: The review enthusiastically praises the choreography as exceptional and transformative for the year's dance offerings, using vivid positive imagery like 'erupt in a chemical reaction' to describe the innovative dance fusion.
